duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through business to business sales and client acquisition.
Prioritize opportunities and manage multiple touch points to drive outcomes and ensure follow-through.
Conduct critical business discussions to solve business owners' problems by promoting and selling products and services.
Maintain client relationships and drive future revenue growth.
Communicate compelling and provocative messages to bring concepts to life and maintain a top position on the sales leaderboard.
Participate in training and utilize support provided to enhance sales skills and performance.
Apply a high level of persistence and communication skills to excel in the role.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
